abstract: Oracle, having spent the last nine months fighting rivals and regulators in order to own Sun Microsystems, has pushed itself into the middle of the scrum of technology heavyweights all jostling for the same corporate customers.
snippet: Oracle, having spent the last nine months fighting rivals and regulators in order to own Sun Microsystems, has pushed itself into the middle of the scrum of technology heavyweights all jostling for the same corporate customers.
lead_paragraph: Oracle, having spent the last nine months fighting rivals and regulators in order to own Sun Microsystems, has pushed itself into the middle of the scrum of technology heavyweights all jostling for the same corporate customers, Ashlee Vance reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: With Sun, Oracle Aims at Giants

abstract: But governments and companies face trade-offs between energy efficiency and keeping data within national borders.
snippet: But governments and companies face trade-offs between energy efficiency and keeping data within national borders.
lead_paragraph: Companies and governments keen to cut their energy bills and burnish their green credentials are thinking carefully about the climate of countries where they locate data centers — the vast hubs of computer servers that have become vital to everything from policing to banking and global communications.

headline.main: For Microsoft Executive, ‘Ireland Is a Beautiful Place for a Data Center’

abstract: Oracle plans to take OpenOffice to the cloud and to keep selling the SunRay thin client. These moves have Oracle backing some of Sun’s more curious products.
snippet: Oracle plans to take OpenOffice to the cloud and to keep selling the SunRay thin client. These moves have Oracle backing some of Sun’s more curious products.
lead_paragraph: As I laid out in an article Wednesday, Oracle expects that through its acquisition of Sun Microsystems, it has a way to sell a full spectrum of hardware and software to business customers.

headline.main: Oracle to Live the Life Quixotic With Sun Products
